content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 2, Milan 2.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 2, Milan 2.
Eric Abidal (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Clarence Seedorf (Milan).
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Milan 2. Thiago Silva (Milan) header from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Clarence Seedorf with a cross following a corner.
Carles Puyol (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Corner,  Milan. Conceded by Eric Abidal.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Alberto Aquilani (Milan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Ibrahim Afellay (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Offside, Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Dani Alves is caught offside.
Antonio Nocerino (Milan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergio Busquets.
Substitution, Barcelona. Ibrahim Afellay replaces David Villa.
Offside, Milan. Ignazio Abate tries a through ball, but Antonio Nocerino is caught offside.

Massimo Ambrosini (Milan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
